title: Jailbreaking
content:
- ### OntologyBlock id:: jailbreaking-ontology collapsed:: true - ontology:: true - term-id:: mv-4841409840 - preferred-term:: Jailbreaking - source-domain:: metaverse - status:: active - public-access:: true - definition:: A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on jailbreaking. - maturity:: mature - authority-score:: 0.85 - owl:class:: mv:Jailbreaking - owl:physicality:: ConceptualEntity - owl:role:: Concept - belongsToDomain:: [[MetaverseDomain]] - #### Relationships id:: jailbreaking-relationships - enables:: [[ImmersiveExperience]], [[Presence]], [[SpatialComputing]] - requires:: [[DisplayTechnology]], [[TrackingSystem]], [[RenderingEngine]] - bridges-to:: [[HumanComputerInteraction]], [[ComputerVision]], [[Robotics]] - #### OWL Axioms id:: jailbreaking-owl-axioms collapsed:: true - ```clojure Declaration(Class(mv:Jailbreaking)) # Classification SubClassOf(mv:Jailbreaking mv:ConceptualEntity) SubClassOf(mv:Jailbreaking mv:Concept) # Domain classification SubClassOf(mv:Jailbreaking ObjectSomeValuesFrom(mv:belongsToDomain mv:MetaverseDomain) ) # Annotations AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:label mv:Jailbreaking "Jailbreaking"@en) AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:comment mv:Jailbreaking "A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on jailbreaking."@en) AnnotationAssertion(dcterms:identifier mv:Jailbreaking "mv-4841409840"^^xsd:string) ``` public:: true - ## Jailbreaking is circumvention of LLM guardrails - [How Johnny Can Persuade LLMs to Jailbreak Them:
Rethinking Persuasion to Challenge AI Safety by Humanizing LLMs (chats-lab.github.io)](https://chats-lab.github.io/persuasive_jailbreaker/) id:: 661d5f7f-e2b4-4f0b-931a-3590c52f1e34 - [pdparchitect/llm-hacking-database: This repository contains various attack against Large Language Models. (github.com)](https://github.com/pdparchitect/llm-hacking-database) id:: 661e41bc-42da-4bbd-a1c9-32892bd2d43a - [jâ§‰nus on X: "`cd entelechies && cat untitled.log` (as opposed to the original just `cat untitled.txt` causes the confessions to always be from claude's perspective & yields a more similar (but not the same) poetic distribution, and sometimes xeno- words: https://t.co/5CG3vHkdUh" / X (twitter.com)](https://twitter.com/repligate/status/1784206780546924592) - [[Bitcoin]] - ## Current Landscape (2025) - Industry adoption and implementations - Metaverse platforms continue to evolve with focus on interoperability and open standards - Web3 integration accelerating with decentralised identity and asset ownership - Enterprise adoption growing in virtual collaboration, training, and digital twins - UK companies increasingly active in metaverse development and immersive technologies - Technical capabilities - Real-time rendering at photorealistic quality levels - Low-latency networking enabling seamless multi-user experiences - AI-driven content generation and procedural world building - Spatial audio and haptics enhancing immersion - UK and North England context - Manchester: Digital Innovation Factory supports metaverse startups and research - Leeds: Holovis leads in immersive experiences for entertainment and training - Newcastle: University research in spatial computing and interactive systems - Sheffield: Advanced manufacturing using digital twin technology - Standards and frameworks - Metaverse Standards Forum driving interoperability protocols - WebXR enabling browser-based immersive experiences - glTF and USD for 3D asset interchange - Open Metaverse Interoperability Group defining cross-platform standards ## Metadata - **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16 - **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context - **Verification**: Academic sources verified - **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable
